name: Tex Murphy: Martian Memorandum
description: The year is 2033. Your name is Tex Murphy, Private Investigator in San Francisco.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: It was ok but way less fun and satisfaction than Mean Streets. Length? Half of Mean Streets. With many aids and just too obvious 'Help' button, it's a must play for Tex Murphy series' fan, but only for story and characters, not really for fun.
I couldnt put my fedora on so im a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ detective 11/10
